name: Hatchet & Bones
description:
Chop and slash trees and foes alike to give fuel to your flame. Your life is tied to the flame's...if it dies you die.

Install Instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Right click and extract to a folder of choice
  • Double click on Hatchet & Bones.exe
  • Chop and Smash...until it is done.

(credits in game folder)
